remarks.format: ## Remarks 大部分的行为，包括支持通过设备模板集和内部分页的模板化呈现，为的行为类似。Much of the behavior of the , including support for templated rendering through device template sets and internal pagination, is similar to the behavior of the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[ObjectList 控件简介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/527ca783-0ff9-4247-b407-8e58d093faa9)或[分页](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2)文档。For more information, see the [Introduction to the ObjectList Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/527ca783-0ff9-4247-b407-8e58d093faa9) or the [Pagination](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2) documentation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建用户定义的类的数组，然后将其绑定到对象加载页面时。The following code example demonstrates how to create an array of a user-defined class and then bind it to an object when the page loads. 它还显示列表和详细信息视图显示命令的方式。It also shows how the list and details views display the commands. 对于此示例，还有一个按钮，显示使用的所有字段的列表形式属性。For this example, there is also a button that displays a form with a list of all the fields using the property. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合仅在数据绑定之后才可用。This collection is available only after data binding. 与不同集合，无法添加或删除此集合中的项。Unlike the collection, you cannot add or remove items in this collection. 默认情况下，此集合是的自动生成的字段集。By default, this collection is the set of automatically generated fields. 如果显式定义任何字段，且包含在任何自动生成字段的后面。If any fields are explicitly defined, they are contained after any automatically generated fields. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性可以列出的所有字段。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to list all the fields of the . 此示例的一个更大的示例摘自概述。This example is part of a larger example for the overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`true`，对象列表处理中的字段顺序集合。When `true`, the object list handles the fields order in the collection. 当`false`，你必须指定字段的顺序，并将设置属性将绑定到数据源。When `false`, you must specify the order of the fields and set the property to bind to a data source. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用以静态方式与它们的详细信息视图中的集合相关联字段属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to statically associate the fields with their collection in the Details view of an control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果以编程方式设置此属性，它不被持久化除非每次请求时进行动态设置。If this property is programmatically set, it is not persisted unless the property is set dynamically on each request. 如果以声明方式设置该属性，每个请求上设置属性。If the property is set declaratively, the property is set on each request. 没有默认值。There is no default. 由于不同的设备具有不同样式的要求。Since different devices have different requirements for styles. 你可能需要若干设置属性。You may want several settings for the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性可设置的样式使用声明性部分指定不同适用于不同设备的设置。The following code example demonstrates how to the use the property to set the style of an using a declarative section to specify different settings for different devices. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置时，控件尝试呈现的快捷方式来调用默认命令。When set, the control attempts to render a shortcut to invoke the default command. 在 HTML 中，在列表视图中的默认呈现显示第一个字段的详细信息视图的链接。In HTML, the default rendering in list view displays the first field as a link to the details view of the . 当属性设置，则单击该链接时的默认命令，将调用。When the property is set, clicking the link invokes the default command. 调用的默认命令引发事件。Invoking the default command raises the event. 的对象设置的值为属性。The of the object is set to the value of the property. 即使定义的默认命令，你应在命令集合包含具有相同名称的命令。Even if a default command is defined, you should include a command with the same name in the commands collection. 如果控件无法呈现图形元素，其中包含的默认命令的快捷方式，则默认命令是仍可通过的呈现命令集合。If the control cannot render a graphical element that includes a shortcut for the default command, the default command is still available through the rendering of the commands collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当定义事件处理程序，项事件生成通过用户交互时通知该处理程序。When an event handler is defined, the notifies the handler when an item event is generated through user interaction. 当通过使用模板，呈现的对象列表通过 ASP.NET 事件冒泡机制调用事件处理程序。When you render an object list by using templates, the event handler is called through the event-bubbling mechanism of ASP.NET. 事件处理程序传递的类型自变量，其中包含有关源项的信息和生成事件的控件的属性。The event handler is passed an argument of type , which contains information about the source item and the property of the control that generated the event. 这可以呈现具有多个关联交互的单个项。This allows you to render a single item with multiple associated interactions. 默认呈现时，该控件呈现每个命令定义为链接的对象列表。On default rendering, the control renders each of the commands defined for the object list as a link. 当用户单击一个链接，用类型自变量调用事件处理程序，其中包含有关源项的信息。When the user clicks a link, the event handler is called with an argument of type , which contains information about the source item. 中的值属性是用户调用该命令的名称。The value in the property is the name of the command that the user invoked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何捕获事件。The following code example demonstrates how to trap the event. 属性指定要执行什么操作。The property specifies what action to perform. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks `More`链接呈现以提供从链接`ListView`的到`DetailsView`的。The `More` link is rendered to provide a link from the `ListView` of the to the `DetailsView` of the . 必须满足以下条件的`More`要呈现的链接：The following conditions must be met for the `More` link to be rendered: - 属性必须设置。The property must be set. - 必须有其他字段或命令要在详细信息视图中呈现。There must be additional fields or commands to be rendered in the details view. 默认呈现显示中的第一个字段`ListView`指向链接的形式`DetailsView`页。The default rendering of the displays the first field in the `ListView` as a link to the `DetailsView` page. 设置属性重写此链接，并使其引发事件。Setting the property overrides this link and causes it to raise the event. 因此，`More`呈现链接时提供的链接`DetailsView`。As a result, the `More` link is rendered to provide a link to the `DetailsView`. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不是相同属性，用于在 WAP 浏览器上使用。This property is not the same as the property, which is used on WAP browsers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件自变量包含到项和命令的集合的引用。The event argument contains a reference to the item and to the collection of commands. 事件处理程序可以自定义根据项的集合。An event handler can customize the collection according to the item. 应用程序可以使用事件，以便提供等效于特定项的快捷菜单的功能。Applications can use the event to provide functionality equivalent to item-specific shortcut menus. 对此事件的命令集合所做的更改不会保留。Changes made to the collection of commands during this event are not persisted. 此事件后，会调用事件时调用。This event is called after the event is called. 你可以使用此事件在显示详细信息视图之前执行其他任务。You can use this event to perform other tasks before showing the detail view. 您可以添加、 删除或重新排列字段，具体取决于在列表视图中选定的项。You can add, remove, or rearrange fields, depending on the item selected in the list view. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要移除的项从事件的详细信息视图的。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to remove an item from the of the detail view of an . 在列表视图中选择要移除的项。The item to remove is selected in the list view. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下选项均可用于通过此属性枚举。The following options are available for this property through the enumeration. |成员名称Member Name|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| ||这是包含对象列表的页面呈现在第一次时显示的默认视图。This is the default view displayed when the page containing the object list is rendered for the first time. 它包含的项，标签字段或如果属性不为空，具有对应的表字段的列的表和行项。It consists of either the label fields of the items, or if the property is not empty, a table with columns corresponding to the table fields and rows for the items. 在 HTML 中，此视图是与合并命令视图中，显示为超链接列表下面的命令。In HTML, this view is combined with the Commands view, with the commands appearing as hyperlinks below the list. 时没有详细信息视图中的详细信息，将呈现的详细信息视图显示每个项的超链接。When there is more information in the Details view, a hyperlink for each item displaying the Details view is rendered.| ||在 HTML 中，此视图是与合并命令视图中，显示为超链接的详细信息的下面的命令。In HTML, this view is combined with the Commands view, with the commands appearing as hyperlinks below the details.| ||此视图仅适用于 WML 设备单独呈现。This view is rendered separately only for WML devices. 它使用的命令包含一个菜单。It consists of a menu with the commands of the . 对于 HTML 设备，列表视图和详细信息视图中每个与相结合使用此视图，显示为超链接的详细信息或列表下面的命令。For HTML devices, the List view and Details view are each combined with this view, with the commands appearing as hyperlinks below the details or list.| > [!NOTE] > 在代码中设置此属性，列表中的项之前，必须选择将此属性设置为或视图。To set this property in code, an item in the list must be selected before setting this property to or view. 尝试将属性设置中选择项之前引发异常。An attempt to set the property before selecting an item throws an exception. 视图模式保持不变处于私有视图状态，因此，而不管是否属性对象是`true`，作为私有字段保留视图模式。A view mode is persisted in a private view state, so that, regardless of whether the property of the object is `true`, the view mode is persisted as a private field. 但是，如果属性是`false`，请求，需要为每个请求重复的数据绑定之间不保留项集合。However, if the property is `false`, the items collection is not persisted between requests, requiring a data bind to be repeated for each request.

exception.span: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than while no item was selected.
